display_long_description:
Step into the danger zone as a commando and become the ultimate Zombie Hunter. Survive endless waves, achieve the highest kill count, and prove your survival time on the leaderboard.

🎥 Gameplay Video 1 – Zombie Hunter Waves
As a fearless Zombie Hunter, face relentless pixel zombies charging from all directions. Aim sharp, shoot fast, and survive.
[media]

🎥 Gameplay Video 2 – Survival Hunter Mode
Endure the chaos and show your Zombie Hunter skills. The longer you last, the higher your score climbs on the board.
[media]

🎥 Gameplay Video 3 – Pixel Hunter Action
Dive into retro-inspired pixel visuals as a true Zombie Hunter, with immersive VR shooting mechanics for nonstop action.
[media]
